title: 小白自建服务器，显示连接超时，求大佬
author: rnaodw
txt_content:
[09:45:56] [Server thread/INFO]: Starting minecraft server version 1.15.2
[09:45:56] [Server thread/INFO]: Loading properties
[09:45:56] [Server thread/INFO]: This server is running Paper version git-Paper-146 (MC: 1.15.2) (Implementing API version 1.15.2-R0.1-SNAPSHOT)
[09:45:56] [Server thread/INFO]: Server Ping Player Sample Count: 12
[09:45:56] [Server thread/INFO]: Using 4 threads for Netty based IO
[09:45:56] [Server thread/INFO]: Debug logging is disabled
[09:45:56] [Server thread/INFO]: Default game type: SURVIVAL
[09:45:56] [Server thread/INFO]: Generating keypair
[09:45:57] [Server thread/INFO]: Starting Minecraft server on *:25565
[09:45:57] [Server thread/INFO]: Using epoll channel type
[09:45:57] [Server thread/WARN]: **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!
[09:45:57] [Server thread/WARN]: The exception was: io.netty.channel.unix.Errors$NativeIoException: bind(..) failed: Address already in use
[09:45:57] [Server thread/WARN]: Perhaps a server is already running on that port?
[09:45:57] [Server thread/INFO]: Stopping server
[09:45:57] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving players
[09:45:57] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving worlds复制代码
上面是日志。下面是启动时的相关代码。
root@iZ2ze7m1uumctjvs1zt55fZ:/opt/mcworld1# bash start_mcworld1.sh
[22:03:35 INFO]: Preparing start region for dimension 'world_the_end'/minecraft:the_end
[22:03:35 INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 0%
[22:03:35 INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 43%

[22:03:37 INFO]: Loaded 441 spawn chunks for world world_the_end
[22:03:37 INFO]: Time elapsed: 2183 ms

[22:03:37 INFO]: Timings Reset

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
修改 server-port=25565


中的 25565 为其他数值，端口冲突了

replies.author: rnaodw
replies.txt_content: 麻烦会的看一下，第一次发帖，多多包含

replies.author: 洞穴夜莺
replies.txt_content: 你不能在同一端口开启多个Minecraft

replies.author: rnaodw
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-30 15:08
修改 server-port=25565

好的，感谢，我去换一个端口

replies.author: rnaodw
replies.txt_content:
Billy12345 发表于 2020-3-30 15:09
你不能在同一端口开启多个Minecraft
端口只对应1.15.2一个MC啊？

replies.author: rnaodw
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-30 15:08
修改 server-port=25565

已解决，感谢！

replies.author: rnaodw
replies.txt_content:
xuyu999 发表于 2020-3-31 14:44
端口冲突问题。
谢谢，问题已解决
